presets.name: Runway 26R
presets.notams: FLIGHT CREWS SHOULD EXPECT AN @RNP APPROACH. RUNWAY IN USE IS ^26R. THIS RUNWAY HAS TWO SYNCHRONISED FLASHING WHITE LIGHTS, ONE AT EACH END OF THE THRESHOLD BAR. DEPARTURE FLIGHT CREWS MUST REPORT READY WITH GATWICK DELIVERY ON 121.955

contractions.spoken: TWO SIX LEFT ZERO EIGHT RIGHT

airportConditionDefinitions.Text: @LVPS IN FORCE. FLIGHT CREWS ARE REMINDED THAT USE OF THE CAT 3 HOLDING POINTS IS MANDATORY
INCREASED BIRD ACTIVITY WITHIN THE AERODROME BOUNDARY.
LARGE FLOCKS OF BIRDS HAVE BEEN OBSERVED WITHIN THE VICINITY OF THE AERODROME.
TURBULENCE MAY BE ENCOUNTERED IN THE FINAL STAGES OF THE APPROACH.
FLIGHT CREWS ARE REMINDED TO USE MINIMUM RUNWAY OCCUPANCY.
FLIGHT CREWS THAT ARE IN RECEIPT OF @DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE REMINDED THAT THEY MUST CONTACT DELIVERY ON 121.955 WHEN READY FOR START.
REPORT IF TWY L IS NOT USEABLE BETWEEN TWY QA AND TWY P ON FIRST CONTACT.
AIRCRAFT VACATING VIA TWY ER MUST MAKE THE FIRST RIGHT ONTO TWY ^08L.
ONLY CALL FOR PUSH ONCE THE TUG IS CONNECTED AND READY TO GO.

Presets.Name: 07L
Presets.Template: REDHILL INFORMATION [ATIS_CODE], TIME [TIME] RUNWAY IN USE ^07L. [TL] [WX]. [ARPT_COND] [NOTAMS] ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT OF INFORMATION [ATIS_CODE] AND ADVISE AIRCRAFT TYPE ON FIRST CONTACT.

Presets.Template: REDHILL INFORMATION [ATIS_CODE], TIME [TIME] RUNWAY IN USE ^25R. [TL] [WX]. [ARPT_COND] [NOTAMS] ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT OF INFORMATION [ATIS_CODE] AND ADVISE AIRCRAFT TYPE ON FIRST CONTACT.

AirportConditionDefinitions.Text: @LVPS IN FORCE. FLIGHT CREWS ARE REMINDED THAT USE OF THE CAT 3 HOLDING POINTS IS MANDATORY
INCREASED BIRD ACTIVITY WITHIN THE AERODROME BOUNDARY.
LARGE FLOCKS OF BIRDS HAVE BEEN OBSERVED WITHIN THE VICINITY OF THE AERODROME.
TURBULENCE MAY BE ENCOUNTERED IN THE FINAL STAGES OF THE APPROACH.
FLIGHT CREWS ARE REMINDED TO USE MINIMUM RUNWAY OCCUPANCY.
FLIGHT CREWS THAT ARE IN RECEIPT OF @DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE REMINDED THAT THEY MUST CONTACT TOWER ON 119.605 WHEN READY FOR START.
ONLY CALL FOR PUSH ONCE THE TUG IS CONNECTED AND READY TO GO.
